884:1: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparamparānabhilāpyānabhilāpya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotyamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
884:2: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ |
884:3: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ || 1 ||
884:9: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān || 4 ||
884:11: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi || 5 ||
884:14: yā ca anuttarapūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām |
884:16: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena |
884:17: kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam || 8 ||
884:18: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām |
884:19: buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam || 9 ||
884:20: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṃgataprāptāḥ |
884:21: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthān cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai || 10 ||
884:25: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam || 12 ||
884:26: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca dhriyanti daśaddiśi loke |
884:27: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ || 13 ||
884:28: yāvata keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ |
884:30: yāvata keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitā sada bhontu arogāḥ |
884:31: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśāḥ || 15 ||
884:32: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu |
884:33: sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā || 16 ||
884:37: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam || 18 ||
884:38: ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu na jātu vimuhyet |
884:39: ye'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇāyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam || 19 ||
884:40: karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam |
884:41: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūryaśaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ || 20 ||
884:42: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ |
884:43: sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu || 21 ||
884:45: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam || 22 ||
884:46: ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā |
884:47: kāyatu vācatu cetanato cā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam || 23 ||
884:48: ye'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ |
884:49: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu || 24 ||
884:50: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān |
884:51: teṣu ca pūja kareyu udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ || 25 ||
884:53: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam || 26 ||
884:54: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃcaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ |
884:56: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiyabuddhān |
884:57: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ || 28 ||
884:65: ye'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam || 32 ||
884:66: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena |
884:67: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena || 33 ||
884:70: ye ca anāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim |
884:71: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān || 35 ||
884:77: mārabalaṃ abalaṃ karamāṇaḥ pūrayi bhadracarībala sarvān || 38 ||
884:83: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣāt bhadracarīya bibudhyiya bodhim || 41 ||
884:84: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ |
884:85: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam || 42 ||
884:87: yādṛśanāmana bhadravidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena || 43 ||
884:89: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām || 44 ||
884:90: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām |
884:91: apramāṇu cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām || 45 ||
884:92: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva |
884:93: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvata niṣṭha mama praṇidhānam || 46 ||
884:94: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā ratnaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām |
884:95: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam || 47 ||
884:98: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ |
884:99: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracari praṇidhānam || 49 ||
884:100: lābha sulabdha sajīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣajanma |
884:101: yādṛśu so hi samantatabhadraste'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti || 50 ||
884:102: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni |
884:103: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam || 51 ||
884:104: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirūpetaḥ |
884:106: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya |
884:107: buddhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam || 53 ||
884:108: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā |
884:109: buddhavijānati yo'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha || 54 ||
884:110: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva |
884:111: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam || 55 ||
884:113: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī vara bhadracarīye || 56 ||
884:114: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān |
884:115: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam || 57 ||
884:116: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā |
884:117: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kariyāvata loke || 58 ||
884:118: tahi jinamaṃḍali śobhaniramye padmavare rūcire upapannaḥ |
884:119: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato amitābhajinasya || 59 ||
884:120: vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabhya ca tasmin nirmita koṭiśatebhiranekaiḥ |
884:121: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena || 60 ||
884:122: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit |
884:123: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam || 61 ||
